body.p:
Williamstown March 16th 1864
To his Excellency T E Bramlet Gov of the Commonwealth of Kentucky,

I hope you will pardon me for again asking you to favor J S Herren but he is very poor & urges me to ask you to give him until the 25th day of Dec 1864 to pay the Bond a copy of which is herewith inclosed Please give the respite asked for upon the condition that the surety will endorses, upon the Bond that he is willing to remain Liable notwithstanding the Extention of time given

I am with great Respect your obt servt
W. T. Simmons
